document_data.mainbody:
Private Lysson was a soldier who served in the Neverwinter Guard during the late 15 century DR.
He wore a full suit of plate mail armor and helm that largely obscured his face.
After the siege of Neverwinter in the , Lysson was stationed in the citys Tower District. He acted as a liaison for Sergeant Creed, guiding adventurers to aid in the sergeants efforts to take back the area from the occupying force of the Many-Arrows orcs.
